dcterms:description: This public dataset is for segmenting lesion boundaries in 2D dermoscopic images. It contains 2000 training, 150 validation, and 600 test images.
dcterms:title: 2017 ISIC Skin Lesion Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Zhuang
J. Shen
dcterms:description: This public dataset is for segmenting seven cardiac structures in 3D CT images. It contains 20 unpaired 3D CT images, which are randomly split into 16 images for training and 4 images for testing.
dcterms:title: 2017 MM-WHS CT Dataset

dcterms:description: This in-house dataset is for segmenting lymph nodes in 2D ultrasound images. It contains 137 training and 100 test images.
dcterms:title: Lymph Node Segmentation Ultrasound Dataset
